Name: Ann
description:
Ann is a 32-year-old mother of 5 and among them three are school going children. She lives in Nyamira, a town surrounded by prime agricultural lands that favor large-scale corn farming. She is a trees and mixed farmer who has farmed for the past many years, enabling her to support her family.

Ann is seeking this loan to buy quality organic manure and seeds to improve her corn crop business that has been significantly affected by COVID-19.

Juhudi Kilimoâ€™s partnership with Kiva is an effective tool for reducing poverty in Kenya especially among women, being the central actors in the rural areas. Ann is hopeful for a positive response to her loan request.
